pageProps.title: Overcoming Adversity: My Journey from Mechanical Engineering to Programming
pageProps.metaDesc: Life is like a jigsaw puzzle, where every piece has its place and its own importance. But, sometimes, we are not able to find the right piece, and it feels like we are trying to put a square block in a round hole. This is what happened to me when I was pursuing mechanical engineering. Growing up in a remote village in India, I did not have access to modern technology and the internet. I was cut off from the rest of the world, and this made me feel like I was missing out on things. But little did I know, my childhood was preparing me for something else, something big.
